remarks.format: ## Remarks 基础结构提供这两个显式编程模型，基于类，以及隐式编程模型使用类，在其中事务自动管理的基础结构。The infrastructure provides both an explicit programming model based on the class, as well as an implicit programming model using the class, in which transactions are automatically managed by the infrastructure. > [!IMPORTANT] > 我们建议您创建使用隐式事务类，以便为您自动管理环境事务上下文。We recommend that you create implicit transactions using the class, so that the ambient transaction context is automatically managed for you. 此外应使用和跨多个函数调用或多个线程调用需要在同一事务的使用的应用程序的类。You should also use the and class for applications that require the use of the same transaction across multiple function calls or multiple thread calls. 此模型的详细信息，请参阅[实现隐式 Transaction Using Transaction Scope](~/docs/framework/data/transactions/implementing-an-implicit-transaction-using-transaction-scope.md)主题。For more information on this model, see the [Implementing An Implicit Transaction Using Transaction Scope](~/docs/framework/data/transactions/implementing-an-implicit-transaction-using-transaction-scope.md) topic. 编写事务应用程序的详细信息，请参阅[Writing A Transactional Application](~/docs/framework/data/transactions/writing-a-transactional-application.md)。For more information on writing a transactional application, see [Writing A Transactional Application](~/docs/framework/data/transactions/writing-a-transactional-application.md). 在实例化通过`new`语句，事务管理器确定哪些事务参与进来。Upon instantiating a by the `new` statement, the transaction manager determines which transaction to participate in. 一旦确定，该范围将始终参与该事务。Once determined, the scope always participates in that transaction. 此决策基于两个因素：是否存在环境事务以及构造函数中 `TransactionScopeOption` 参数的值。The decision is based on two factors: whether an ambient transaction is present and the value of the `TransactionScopeOption` parameter in the constructor. 环境事务是在代码中执行的事务。The ambient transaction is the transaction your code executes in. 可通过调用 类的静态 属性，获取对环境事务的引用。You can obtain a reference to the ambient transaction by calling the static property of the class. 有关如何使用此参数的详细信息，请参阅的"事务流管理"部分[实现隐式 Transaction Using Transaction Scope](~/docs/framework/data/transactions/implementing-an-implicit-transaction-using-transaction-scope.md)主题。For more information on how this parameter is used, see the "Transaction Flow Management" section of the [Implementing An Implicit Transaction Using Transaction Scope](~/docs/framework/data/transactions/implementing-an-implicit-transaction-using-transaction-scope.md) topic. 如果事务范围内未不发生任何异常 (即之间的初始化对象并调用其方法)，则的事务范围所参与的允许才能继续。If no exception occurs within the transaction scope (that is, between the initialization of the object and the calling of its method), then the transaction in which the scope participates is allowed to proceed. 如果异常确实发生事务范围内，参与到其中的事务将回滚。If an exception does occur within the transaction scope, the transaction in which it participates will be rolled back. 你的应用程序完成所有工作时它想要在事务中执行，应调用方法一次，从而通知该事务管理器是可接受提交事务。When your application completes all work it wants to perform in a transaction, you should call the method only once to inform that transaction manager that it is acceptable to commit the transaction. 未能调用此方法中止事务。Failing to call this method aborts the transaction. 调用方法标记的事务范围的末尾。A call to the method marks the end of the transaction scope. 在调用此方法之后所发生的异常不会影响事务。Exceptions that occur after calling this method may not affect the transaction. 如果您修改的值的作用域，将引发异常时调用。If you modify the value of inside a scope, an exception is thrown when is called. 但是，在作用域结束时，以前的值将恢复。However, at the end of the scope, the previous value is restored. 此外，如果您调用上创建了事务的事务作用域，在事务中止的作用域的末尾。In addition, if you call on inside a transaction scope that created the transaction, the transaction aborts at the end of the scope. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用类来定义要参与事务的代码块。The following example demonstrates how to use the class to define a block of code to participate in a transaction. [!code-csharp[TransactionScope#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/TransactionScope/cs/ScopeWithSQL.cs#1)] [!code-vb[TransactionScope#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/TransactionScope/vb/ScopeWithSQL.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无误后，作用域中的所有操作都已成功都完成，应调用此方法一次通知该事务管理器，跨所有资源的状态是一致的并且可以提交事务。When you are satisfied that all operations within the scope are completed successfully, you should call this method only once to inform that transaction manager that the state across all resources is consistent, and the transaction can be committed. 它是很好的做法，若要将该调用中的最后一个语句作为`using`块。It is very good practice to put the call as the last statement in the `using` block. 有关如何使用此方法的详细信息，请参阅[实现隐式 Transaction Using Transaction Scope](~/docs/framework/data/transactions/implementing-an-implicit-transaction-using-transaction-scope.md)主题。For more information on how this method is used, see the [Implementing An Implicit Transaction Using Transaction Scope](~/docs/framework/data/transactions/implementing-an-implicit-transaction-using-transaction-scope.md) topic. 未能调用此方法将中止事务，因为事务管理器将此解释为系统故障时，或在事务范围内引发的异常。Failing to call this method aborts the transaction, because the transaction manager interprets this as a system failure, or exceptions thrown within the scope of transaction. 但是，您还应注意调用此方法不能保证事务的提交。However, you should also note that calling this method does not guarantee a commit of the transaction. 它只是一种将状态通知给事务管理器的方式。It is merely a way of informing the transaction manager of your status. 调用此方法后，无法再访问环境事务通过属性，并尝试执行此操作会引发异常。After calling this method, you can no longer access the ambient transaction via the property, and trying to do so results in an exception being thrown. 在进行资源管理器之间的提交的实际工作`End Using`语句如果对象创建了事务。The actual work of commit between the resources manager happens at the `End Using` statement if the object created the transaction. 如果该对象未创建事务，则每当 对象的所有者调用 时都会执行提交。If it did not create the transaction, the commit occurs whenever is called by the owner of the object. 此时，事务管理器调用资源管理器，并告知用户提交或回滚，基于在调用了此方法对象。At that point the Transaction Manager calls the resource managers and informs them to either commit or rollback, based on whether this method was called on the object. ## original state. 一个不真正提交事务时引发。A is thrown if the transaction is not actually committed. 此方法是同步的并阻止，直到提交或中止事务。This method is synchronous and blocks until the transaction has been committed or aborted. 正因为如此，您应在 Windows 窗体 (WinForm) 应用程序中，使用此方法时请格外小心，或可能发生死锁。Because of this, you should be extremely careful when using this method in a Windows Form (WinForm) application, or a deadlock can occur. 如果内调用此方法一个 WinForm 控件事件 （例如，单击某个按钮），并使用同步方法以指示要执行的中间处理事务，一些 UI 任务 （例如，更改颜色） 的控件会发生死锁。If you call this method inside one WinForm Control event (for example, clicking a button), and use the synchronous method to direct the control to perform some UI tasks (for example, changing colors) in the middle of processing the transaction, a deadlock will happen. 这是因为方法是同步的阻止辅助线程，直到用户界面线程完成其作业。This is because the method is synchronous and blocks the worker thread until the UI thread finishes its job. 但是，在我们的方案，在 UI 线程正在还等待工作线程来提交事务。However, in our scenario, the UI thread is also waiting for the worker thread to commit the transaction. 结果是所有线程都无法继续，作用域将无限期等待完成的提交。The result is that none is able to proceed and the scope waits indefinitely for the Commit to finish. 应使用而非只要有可能，因为它是异步的因此不太容易发生死锁。You
